section.title: Load External Content
section.para: Open the file /exercises/index.html in your browser. Use the file /exercises/js/load.js. Your task is to load the content of a blog item when a user clicks on the title of the item.

listitem.para: Create a target div after the headline for each blog post.
Use the $.fn.load method to load /exercises/data/blog.html; use a selector to indicate which elements you need from the file for the given post, and load them into the target div.
